code:
flowchart TB
    %% ============================================
    %% USER MANAGEMENT & AUTHENTICATION
    %% ============================================
    User[User]
    CandidateProfile[CandidateProfile]
    RecruiterProfile[RecruiterProfile]
    Message[Message]
    Notification[Notification]
    UserMembership[UserMembership]
    PaymentTransaction[PaymentTransaction]

    %% Relationships - User Management (Diamond shapes)
    R1{has}
    R2{has}
    R3{sends}
    R4{receives}
    R5{receives}
    R6{has}
    R7{makes}

    User --> R1
    R1 --> CandidateProfile
    User --> R2
    R2 --> RecruiterProfile
    User --> R3
    R3 --> Message
    Message --> R4
    R4 --> User
    User --> R5
    R5 --> Notification
    User --> R6
    R6 --> UserMembership
    User --> R7
    R7 --> PaymentTransaction

    %% ============================================
    %% STRUCTURED RESUME DATA
    %% ============================================
    Experience[Experience]
    Education[Education]
    Project[Project]
    Skill[Skill]
    CandidateSkill[CandidateSkill]

    %% Relationships - Resume Data
    R8{has}
    R9{has}
    R10{has}
    R11{has}
    R12{uses}

    CandidateProfile --> R8
    R8 --> Experience
    CandidateProfile --> R9
    R9 --> Education
    CandidateProfile --> R10
    R10 --> Project
    CandidateProfile --> R11
    R11 --> CandidateSkill
    CandidateSkill --> R12
    R12 --> Skill

    %% ============================================
    %% COMPANY & JOBS
    %% ============================================
    Company[Company]
    Job[Job]
    CompanyReview[CompanyReview]
    CompanyFollow[CompanyFollow]
    Category[Category]
    JobCategory[JobCategory]
    JobSkill[JobSkill]
    SavedJob[SavedJob]

    %% Relationships - Company & Jobs
    R13{employs}
    R14{posts}
    R15{receives}
    R16{followed_by}
    R17{works_for}
    R18{posts}
    R19{posted_by}
    R20{created_by}
    R21{requires}
    R22{receives}
    R23{linked_to}
    R24{saved_in}
    R25{categorized_as}
    R26{required_by}
    R27{skill_for}
    R28{used_by}
    R29{required_by}
    R30{categorizes}
    R31{categorizes}
    R32{category_of}
    R33{writes}
    R34{reviews}
    R35{written_by}
    R36{follows}
    R37{followed}
    R38{follower}
    R39{saves}
    R40{saved_by}
    R41{job_saved}

    Company --> R13
    R13 --> RecruiterProfile
    Company --> R14
    R14 --> Job
    Company --> R15
    R15 --> CompanyReview
    Company --> R16
    R16 --> CompanyFollow
    RecruiterProfile --> R17
    R17 --> Company
    RecruiterProfile --> R18
    R18 --> Job
    Job --> R19
    R19 --> Company
    Job --> R20
    R20 --> RecruiterProfile
    Job --> R21
    R21 --> JobSkill
    Job --> R22
    R22 --> Application
    Job --> R23
    R23 --> Interview
    Job --> R24
    R24 --> SavedJob
    Job --> R25
    R25 --> JobCategory
    JobSkill --> R26
    R26 --> Job
    JobSkill --> R27
    R27 --> Skill
    Skill --> R28
    R28 --> CandidateSkill
    Skill --> R29
    R29 --> JobSkill
    Category --> R30
    R30 --> JobCategory
    JobCategory --> R31
    R31 --> Job
    JobCategory --> R32
    R32 --> Category
    CandidateProfile --> R33
    R33 --> CompanyReview
    CompanyReview --> R34
    R34 --> Company
    CompanyReview --> R35
    R35 --> CandidateProfile
    CandidateProfile --> R36
    R36 --> CompanyFollow
    CompanyFollow --> R37
    R37 --> Company
    CompanyFollow --> R38
    R38 --> CandidateProfile
    CandidateProfile --> R39
    R39 --> SavedJob
    SavedJob --> R40
    R40 --> CandidateProfile
    SavedJob --> R41
    R41 --> Job

    %% ============================================
    %% APPLICATION & INTERVIEW PROCESS
    %% ============================================
    Application[Application]
    ApplicationHistory[ApplicationHistory]
    ApplicationNote[ApplicationNote]
    Interview[Interview]
    InterviewExchange[InterviewExchange]
    QuestionBank[QuestionBank]

    %% Relationships - Application & Interview
    R42{submits}
    R43{applies_to}
    R44{submitted_by}
    R45{has}
    R46{tracks}
    R47{has_notes}
    R48{tracks}
    R49{notes}
    R50{takes}
    R51{linked_to}
    R52{taken_by}
    R53{for}
    R54{contains}
    R55{part_of}

    CandidateProfile --> R42
    R42 --> Application
    Application --> R43
    R43 --> Job
    Application --> R44
    R44 --> CandidateProfile
    Application --> R45
    R45 --> Interview
    Application --> R46
    R46 --> ApplicationHistory
    Application --> R47
    R47 --> ApplicationNote
    ApplicationHistory --> R48
    R48 --> Application
    ApplicationNote --> R49
    R49 --> Application
    CandidateProfile --> R50
    R50 --> Interview
    Interview --> R51
    R51 --> Application
    Interview --> R52
    R52 --> CandidateProfile
    Interview --> R53
    R53 --> Job
    Interview --> R54
    R54 --> InterviewExchange
    InterviewExchange --> R55
    R55 --> Interview

    %% ============================================
    %% OFFER MANAGEMENT
    %% ============================================
    Offer[Offer]

    %% Relationships - Offer
    R56{receives}
    R57{sent_for}

    Application --> R56
    R56 --> Offer
    Offer --> R57
    R57 --> Application

    %% ============================================
    %% MEMBERSHIP & PAYMENT SYSTEM
    %% ============================================
    MembershipPlan[MembershipPlan]

    %% Relationships - Membership & Payment
    R58{plan}
    R59{purchased}
    R60{belongs_to}
    R61{plan}
    R62{paid_for}
    R63{paid_by}
    R64{for_plan}
    R65{activates}

    MembershipPlan --> R58
    R58 --> UserMembership
    MembershipPlan --> R59
    R59 --> PaymentTransaction
    UserMembership --> R60
    R60 --> User
    UserMembership --> R61
    R61 --> MembershipPlan
    UserMembership --> R62
    R62 --> PaymentTransaction
    PaymentTransaction --> R63
    R63 --> User
    PaymentTransaction --> R64
    R64 --> MembershipPlan
    PaymentTransaction --> R65
    R65 --> UserMembership

    %% Styling
    classDef entityStyle fill:#e1f5ff,stroke:#01579b,stroke-width:2px
    classDef relationshipStyle fill:#fff9c4,stroke:#f57f17,stroke-width:2px,shape:rhombus

    class User,CandidateProfile,RecruiterProfile,Message,Notification,UserMembership,PaymentTransaction,Experience,Education,Project,Skill,CandidateSkill,Company,Job,CompanyReview,CompanyFollow,Category,JobCategory,JobSkill,SavedJob,Application,ApplicationHistory,ApplicationNote,Interview,InterviewExchange,QuestionBank,Offer,MembershipPlan entityStyle

    class R1,R2,R3,R4,R5,R6,R7,R8,R9,R10,R11,R12,R13,R14,R15,R16,R17,R18,R19,R20,R21,R22,R23,R24,R25,R26,R27,R28,R29,R30,R31,R32,R33,R34,R35,R36,R37,R38,R39,R40,R41,R42,R43,R44,R45,R46,R47,R48,R49,R50,R51,R52,R53,R54,R55,R56,R57,R58,R59,R60,R61,R62,R63,R64,R65 relationshipStyle
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
